text: Welcome to the world of drums! Let's get familiar with the parts of a drum kit and why rhythm is the heartbeat of music.
Learn how drum notation works: the staff, different note positions for snare, bass, hi-hat, and more.
Now let's explore simple drum patterns and time signatures commonly used in music.
Get into the habit of good hand technique! Learn basic sticking patterns: RLRL, paradiddles, and more.
Time to play along! Here's a basic practice routine combining rhythm, coordination, and sticking.
